file_content.text: Come on, pirates! I know you're out there!
The beacons worked. The rakghouls are dead.
Yes! I knew you'd do it. Those raks won't threaten us for a while.
With you on our side, my lord, there's no way Taris gets rebuilt.
Appreciate the assist, sir. I'll stay here and monitor this pirate situation.
Between the pirates and the raks, you more than earned your pay, hunter.
Between the pirates and the raks... the Empire's in your debt. So am I.
Good luck out there. I'd follow you out, but I still owe my teammates some pirate blood.
Kill some raks for me!
Good to see you again, though I can't say I've been lonely.
While you were gone, I had some rakghoul visitors. A lot of 'em.
I blasted the raks, but there's more out there. Won't be long before they run out of pirate meals and come looking for Imperial meat.
If the rakghouls interfere with Imperial operations, we'll hunt them to extinction.
Let them try.
Or we could hit them first!
Let the rakghouls feast on the Republic.
Or Republic meat instead.
Maybe in time, my lord, but first we better control their numbers.
A little population control should solve our rakghoul problem.
We'll stop them first.
Nothing makes a meal out of me.
Let those raks try.
Better to take the fight to them, right, hunter?
First pirates, now rakghouls?
At least you've still got the strength to tear them up.
The raks hide out in their tunnels, but I have Wylenn-brand acoustic beacons. They make a sound that's music to rakghoul ears.
Use the beacons near their tunnels, and the rak hunters will come running--right into your lightsaber.
Use the beacons near their caves, and the rak hunters will charge right into your blaster sights.
Set off the beacons near their warrens, and the rakghoul hunters will run right for you.
Give me those beacons.
These raks worth a reward?
My teammates were owed hazard pay. Kill the raks, and it's yours.
The rakghouls will suffer.
Wish I could fight by your side.
Here are the beacons. Set 'em off near the rakghoul tunnels, and get ready for a fight!
I'm out. [Refuse quest]
Sounds rough. [Refuse quest]
You're turning down a good fight, but it's your call.
Ha! That'll teach those pirates to build on Taris. Unfortunately, our problems aren't over.
Overload those generators. I'll take care of myself.
My lord, good to see you! Cut down any pirates yet?
Name's Skolin, sir. Sergeant Skolin. Seriously, you just missed the pirates.
Killing for sport, hunter? You hit the jackpot! This place is crawling with pirates.
Whoa! Sorry, almost blasted you! More pirates than friendlies out here.
Group of them thought they had me. One shoots me in the leg, then I whip out my combustion grenades and boom! Crispy!
Takes a lot to bring down those infected pirates, but they've got nothin' on me!
What do you mean, "infected"?
Infected?
Touch of the rakghoul plague.
Calm down, Sergeant.
Sorry. I'm loaded up on pain meds and stims. Gotta stay alert.
You're not that tough.
Maybe I'm not on your level, but I can hold my own.
My team was on a mission to shut down this pirate outpost--raze and rage! Rakghouls got to them first.
Now the pirates're slobbering crazies, half rak, half scavenger. Killed my team before we could finish our mission, but I'm making them pay!
Infected or not, these pirates made you look foolish, Sergeant.
You should've been prepared.
Your men became pirate chew toys because they were weak, Sergeant.
You're too sentimental.
Understood, my lord, but we weren't equipped to fight rabid maniacs--though apparently I have a knack for it.
Your personal vendetta doesn't outweigh the Empire's mission, Sergeant.
Get back on task.
I know, sir, but with my bad leg, the rak pirates'll swarm me. You'd stand a better chance.
You should've crippled the camp when you had the chance.
Never leave a job unfinished.
We never stood a chance. Maybe a merc like you could pull it off.
Make those pirates hurt for what they did.
Enjoy the pirates' screams.
I plan on it.
Is revenge really necessary?
Maybe not, but it sure feels good.
Much as I love killing pirates, the mission stands. My leg's too numb to finish it, but maybe you could help.
You're boring me, Sergeant.
Wait! Our mission's not complete, and I can't finish it with this bad leg.
All you'd need to do is overload the power generators. Crank on enough, and you'll fry the pirates' equipment. Then nobody can call the camp home.
I'll finish your mission.
I'll finish your mission.
Make 'em hurt, and I'll blast some pirate scum in your honor.
Fine, but you keep safe.
I'll be here when you come back. Hopefully with a few more notches in my blaster.
Just kick the pirates' generators to the highest setting. Once enough power's up, their whole infrastructure's toast!
Another time. [Refuse quest]
Lucky pirates. We'll destroy this place soon enough.
Pirates, raks--I can take 'em all!
